thread.title: Chelsea transfer news: Franck Kessie wanted by 20 top European clubs as agent reveals huge interest in Atalanta star
thread.title_full: Chelsea transfer news: Franck Kessie wanted by 20 top European clubs as agent reveals huge interest in Atalanta star

author: achapman
title: Chelsea transfer news: Franck Kessie wanted by 20 top European clubs as agent reveals huge interest in Atalanta star
text:
EFL Being Franck Chelsea transfer news: Franck Kessie wanted by 20 top European clubs as agent reveals huge interest in Atalanta star 
Young Ivorian midfielder a big-money target for Blues but Antonio Conte faces huge battle to secure his signature By Anthony Chapman 23rd March 2017, 11:49 am Updated: 23rd March 2017, 12:25 pm Comments CHELSEA face a battle with 19 other clubs for the signature of Atalanta star Franck Kessie. 
That’s according to his agent, who claims the midfielder is wanted by ‘the best in Europe.’ EPA 3 Chelsea target Franck Kessie is being chased by 20 top European clubs 
Kessie is expected to make a big move this summer and Chelsea are one of the front-runners for his signature . Keep up to date with ALL the Chelsea news, gossip, transfers and goals on our club page plus fixtures, results and live match commentary 
Manchester United have also been linked, with Kessie previously admitting that he ‘dreams’ of playing at Old Trafford . 
However, it appears that a large number of clubs on the continent are also keen on landing the 20-year-old Ivorian. Watch Antonio Conte's wild celebrations after Chelsea's winning goal at Stoke Getty Images 3 The Atalanta star is expected to make a big transfer this summer 
Representative George Atangana claims that 20 clubs in total are looking to pounce, with Napoli specifically named as an ‘attractive’ destination. 
The agent told Radio Kiss Kiss : “There are at least 20 clubs following the lad, including the best in Europe. Most Read In Sport Paige sex tape bombshell as fans express outrage at 'sex act over WWE championship belt' ROYAL FUMBLE British WWE star Paige confirms X-rated leak after videos were hacked from her phone and posted online BIG HART Joe Hart shows incredible sportsmanship as he fist bumps Lukas Podolski after German scores screamer mark of respect FA plan tribute to security services and victims against Lithuania on Sunday after terror attack FORGETTING SOMETHING? Tennis legend Roger Federer hits bum note as he signs autograph for fan... who looks like she's forgotten her underwear Team news Jake Livemore and Michael Keane start for England in Germany as Gareth Southgate experiments with 3-4-3 Getty Images 3 Kessie previously admitted he would like to play for Man Utd 
“We haven’t spoken to Aurelio De Laurentiis yet. We’ll talk about the transfer market in June. 
“Napoli is an attractive club, they have a great coach in Maurizio Sarri. His price? Whoever wants him will have to invest a lot.”
